document.full_text: china's huawei technologies is making an aggressive push into the consumer electronics space, marketing its new smartphones and tablet pcs in glitzy beijing malls and even a milan fashion show as it seeks to emerge from decades of obscurity.
document.title: analysis: huawei lifts veil in bold bet on consumer gadgets
lines_and_colors: china's huawei technologies is making an aggressive push into the consumer electronics space, marketing its new smartphones and tablet pcs in glitzy beijing malls and even a milan fashion show as it seeks to emerge from decades of obscurity.
